question: This country has been chosen as the partner country for the 23rd edition of Technology Summit in New Delhi.
explanation: Canada has been chosen as the partner country for the 23rd edition of Technology Summit which is scheduled to be held from 14th - 15th November, 2017 in New Delhi. This event is India's largest knowledge and technology conference and exhibition. It is jointly organised by the Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) and the Indian Department of Science and Technology (DST). The theme of this summit will be 'Advanced Manufacturing' focusing on advances in various sectors including aerospace, Aviation, Artificial Intelligence and Life Sciences.
